sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
	'SELECT CAST(count(ID) as VARCHAR(10)) as COUNT FROM MERCHANT_ACTIVITY_LOG ',
	'WHERE TRANSACTION_DATE BETWEEN ''',
	variables('startDateMerchant'),
	''' AND ''',
	variables('endDateMerchant'),
	''''
)

@concat(
	'SELECT * FROM MERCHANT_ACTIVITY_LOG ',
	'WHERE TRANSACTION_DATE BETWEEN ''',
	variables('startDateMerchant'),
	''' AND ''',
	variables('endDateMerchant'),
	''''
)
